sub_title: Free-lance consultant in M&E and Food security
summary: As a free-lance consultant my competence is in project & grant management, Food security and M&E and gender.  I have 25 years of experience, ten as team leader, in numerous countries in Asia and Africa in projects financed by EU, DFID, MCC (USA), UN and the Dutch Government.

treasury_media.title: BSF team in 2012
treasury_media.description: BSF secretariat team in 2012 in Juba

treasury_media.title: Basic Services Fund, South Sudan - Mott MacDonald
treasury_media.description: Two decades of war all but obliterated government infrastructure in Southern Sudan, leaving an estimated 10 million people without even the most basic services - healthcare, education, clean water or sanitation. Non-governmental organisations (NGOs) played a major role in providing humanitarian relief during the war.

education.field_of_study: Research Methods and Data Analysis (qualitative, PRA and quantitative survey techniques)

projects.title: Tank rehabilitation Podicherry (India)
projects.description: Repair of 86 Village water tanks for irrigation of small-holder rice production. The repair became urgent due to deteriorating groundwater levels as a result of over-extraction of groundwater.

profile_positions.description: Democratic Republic of Congo, Goma, inception phase project director with Mercy Corps for FARM (Food security & inclusive access to resources for conflict sensitive market development) financed by the Dutch government and with the aim to support Food Security and serve as incubator and innovator for agricultural Value Chain Development based on Market for the Poor (with a financial envelop of US$18m for 4 years).
profile_positions.title: Project Director

profile_positions.description: This Civil Society Fund started in April 2016 and is funded by the governments of the Netherlands (lead donor), Norway and Sweden.  CSF aims to strengthen national civil society organsations with Training and grants for Capacity Building.  The project is implemented by a consortium led by Ecorys (Fund manager) with VNG-international, INTRAC and AKVO.org. CSF's first phase runs for 5 years till April 2021 but the plan is that project's timeline covers twenty years.
profile_positions.title: Team-leader

profile_positions.description: Moldova’s MCC had a 5y (September 2010-September 2015) budget of 260m US$ and within this ISRA has a budget of US$ 8m for the formation of new and small decentralized (away from the centralized public sector institutional framework) and community-based Water User Associations.
profile_positions.title: Project Adviser for ISRA
senior project manager

company.name: Euroconsult Mott MacDonald / BMB Mott MacDonald

profile_positions.company: Euroconsult Mott MacDonald / BMB Mott MacDonald
profile_positions.description:
Co-financed project (€30 m.) “Adarsha Gram” implemented through the Ministry of Land to assist twenty thousand landless poor with Title Deeds for ownership of land&shelter, access to safe drinking water and Micro Credit. 
Responsibilities included managing small grants with  18 NGO to deliver and M&E of Community Development interventins in each of the four hundred Adarsha Gram communities.
2.Lead team of 6 National Consultants to Process data of project baseline study and report on results and use results to update and maintain project database of 400 communities with twenty thousand households; 
3.Redefine and select key indicators for M&E to reflect the project priorities in drinking water, Title Deeds for the Land and size of the homestead allocated to the landless and on-the-job training of field monitors.
4.Draft and edit all project reporting for annual workplans, progres reports and completion reports.
profile_positions.title: Monitoring and Evaluation Specialist for Adarsha Gram project

profile_positions.description: UNDP managed and EU financed trust fund for nation-wide Post Conflict Community Based Recovery and Rehabilitation program. Duties included setting-up the funds secretariat and organize and administer the grant scheme's call for proposals.
profile_positions.title: UNDP lead-consultant Project Proposal Assessment & Design

profile_positions.location: short-term assignments in Agrica and Asia
profile_positions.description: Consultant on short-terms assignments for different organizations in project management, design and M&E.
profile_positions.title: Project consultant for design and M&E

profile_positions.title: Agronomist

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the training and  preparation of crop diversification programme (census study) into irrigated and commercial horticultural crops (tomatoes, onion, potato) produced by female members of the rural households in cropping patterns dominated by irrigated rice.
profile_positions.title: Consultant on a horticultural crop development

profile_positions.description: M&E consultant on IFAD projects in the East Africa region with the responsibility for monitoring and evaluation of agricultural and rural  development projects in The Sudan(credit), Ethiopia (drought rehabilitation), Uganda (women in development in Hoima district), Tanzania (small holders), The Seychelles (horticultural production), and Kenya (drought rehabilitation in Coast Asal region).
profile_positions.title: Monitoring and Evaluation Specialist

volunteer_experiences.role: co-initiator and secretary to the board
volunteer_experiences.description: In 2000/04, I was part of a small group that took the initiative to start the process that culminated in 2007 in a major renovation of the 13th Century church in our village (www.kerkvierhuizen.nl).
